verses.samhita: namaqH sOmA#ya ca ruqdrAya# caq nama#stAqmrAya# cAruqNAya# caq nama#H Saq~ggAya# ca paSuqpata#yE caq nama# uqgrAya# ca BIqmAya# caq namO# agrEvaqdhAya# ca dUrEvaqdhAya# caq namO# haqntrE caq hanI#yasE caq namO# vRuqkShEByOq hari#kESEByOq nama#stAqrAyaq nama#H SaqBaMvE# ca mayOqBavE# caq nama#H Sa~gkaqrAya# ca mayaskaqrAya# caq nama#H SiqvAya# ca Siqvata#rAya caq - [  ] 17

namaqstIrthyA#ya caq kUlyA#ya caq nama#H pAqryA#ya cAvAqryA#ya caq nama#H praqtara#NAya cOqttara#NAya caq nama# AtAqryA#ya cAlAqdyA#ya caq namaqH SaShpyA#ya caq PEnyA#ya caq nama#H sikaqtyA#ya ca pravAqhyA#ya ca || 18
